message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I understand its true worth to be $12,000. However, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price that reflects both the value it brings and your unique position as a potential buyer. My proposal is to offer the product to you for $10,000. This price not only ensures a fair transaction but also allows for a mutually beneficial exchange. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if you require further information to make a decision.
